lead_paragraph: Juan Nicasio pitched six dominant innings in his Pittsburgh debut and Francisco Cevelli hit a two-run double as the Pirates beat the St. Louis Cardinals 5-1 Wednesday night to sweep an opening three-game series between the teams with the best regular-season records in the major leagues last year.

headline.print_headline: Nicascio Helps Pirates Beat Cardinals 5-1 for 3-Game Sweep
headline.main: Nicascio Helps Pirates Beat Cardinals 5-1 for 3-Game Sweep
